translateOperator()

translateOperator(string  $operator)

Method for translating operators from the format used in RESTful requests to those used in the database.

Parameters

string $operator

An operator in RESTful format to be translated to a traditional arithmetic operator.

Tags

None found

formatParameters()

formatParameters(array<mixed,mixed>  $parameters)

Method used to parse the request parameters of a request object and present them in a format that the database wrapper in turn can translate to sql.

However, due to lack of time there are some inconsistencies in what format the database wrapper expects where conditions to be in for different types of operations. Currently the request parameters must be formatted when inserting and when deleting but not when updating.

Parameters

array<mixed,mixed> $parameters

Request parameters to be formatted.

Tags

None found

filterParameters()

filterParameters(array<mixed,string>  $whiteListedParameters, array<mixed,mixed>  $parameters)

Method to pick out certain parameters of interest from an array.

Parameters

array<mixed,string> $whiteListedParameters

An array containing the parameters to be picked out.
array<mixed,mixed> $parameters

An array of parameters to be filtered.

Tags

None found

unsetAuthenticationParameters()

unsetAuthenticationParameters(  $request)

Method to remove authentication parameters from a request. This method is necessary due to the fact that this api expects authentication information to be passed as part of the json representing the database object. Usually this information is provided in the HTTP header, and if that had been the case this wouldn't be necessary.

Parameters

$request

Tags

None found
